title: Fastest Operating License Acquisition
description: In 2019, Poland had the shortest time required to obtain an operating license, taking only 1.2 days.

title: Perfect Female Primary Education Persistence
description: In 2021, 100% of females in Poland persisted to the last grade of primary education, indicating full retention.

title: Lowest Child Stunting Rates
description: As of 2024, only 1% of children under 5 in Poland were affected by stunting, the lowest rate globally.

title: Minimal Health Expenditure Poverty Impact
description: In 2020, only 0.01% of Poland's population was pushed further below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses.
